data.description: Modern cross-platform HTTP load-testing tool written in Go

data.name: s-tui
data.description: Terminal-based CPU stress and monitoring utility

data.name: beeswithmachineguns
data.description: A utility for arming (creating) many bees (micro EC2 instances) to attack (load test) targets (web applications).

data.name: hey
data.description: HTTP load generator, ApacheBench (ab) replacement, formerly known as rakyll/boom

data.name: loadtest
data.description: Runs a load test on the selected URL. Easy to extend minimally for your own ends.

data.name: go-wrk
data.description: go-wrk - a HTTP benchmarking tool based in spirit on the excellent wrk tool (https://github.com/wg/wrk)

data.name: goad
data.description: Goad is an AWS Lambda powered, highly distributed, load testing tool

data.name: goreplay
data.description: GoReplay is an open-source tool for capturing and replaying live HTTP traffic into a test environment in order to continuously test your system with real data. It can be used to increase confidence in code deployments, configuration changes and infrastructure changes.

data.name: vegeta
data.description: HTTP load testing tool and library. It's over 9000!
